Group 1 Mapping from A - Hospital Discharge Report (eHN) to Bundle (HDR)

Source CodeRelationshipTarget CodeComment
HospitalDischargeReport.header (A.1 - Hospital Discharge Report header data element)is related toBundleSee the header model and map for details

Group 2 Mapping from A - Hospital Discharge Report (eHN) to Composition (HDR)

Source CodeRelationshipTarget CodeComment
HospitalDischargeReport.body (A.2 - Hospital Discharge Report body data element)is related toCompositionSee details below
HospitalDischargeReport.body.presentedForm (A.2.0 - Hospital Discharge Report in its narrative form)is related toComposition.extension:presentedForm
HospitalDischargeReport.body.advanceDirectives (A.2.1 - Advance directives)is equivalent toComposition.section:sectionAdvanceDirectives
HospitalDischargeReport.body.alerts (A.2.2 - Alerts)is related toComposition.sectionCovered by more sections. See the Alerts model and map for details
HospitalDischargeReport.body.encounter (A.2.3 - Encounter)is related toComposition.encounterSee the InPatientEncounter model and map for details
HospitalDischargeReport.body.admissionEvaluation (A.2.4 - Admission evaluation)is related toComposition.sectionCovered by more sections. See the Admission Evaluation model and map for details
HospitalDischargeReport.body.patientHistory (A.2.5 - Patient history)is related toComposition.sectionCovered by more sections. See the Patient History model and map for details
HospitalDischargeReport.body.hospitalStay (A.2.6 - Course of hospitalisation (Hospital stay))is related toComposition.sectionCovered by more sections. See the Hospital Course model and map for details
HospitalDischargeReport.body.dischargeDetails (A.2.7 - Discharge details)is related toComposition.sectionCovered by more sections. See the below for details
HospitalDischargeReport.body.dischargeDetails.objectiveFindings (A.2.7.1 - Objective findings)is related toComposition.section:sectionDischargeDetailsIf not structured in sections (TBC)
HospitalDischargeReport.body.dischargeDetails.objectiveFindings (A.2.7.1 - Objective findings)is related toComposition.section:sectionDischargeFindingsTBC
HospitalDischargeReport.body.dischargeDetails.functionalStatus (A.2.7.2 - Functional status)is related toComposition.section:sectionDischargeDetailsIf not structured in sections (TBC)
HospitalDischargeReport.body.dischargeDetails.functionalStatus (A.2.7.2 - Functional status)is related toComposition.section:sectionFunctionalStatusIs the same section of the Admission Evaluation ? TBC
HospitalDischargeReport.body.dischargeDetails.dischargeNote (A.2.7.3 - Discharge note)is related toComposition.section:sectionDischargeDetails.textTBC
HospitalDischargeReport.body.recommendations (A.2.8 - Care plan and other recommendations after discharge.)is related toComposition.sectionPotentially covered by several sections
HospitalDischargeReport.body.recommendations.carePlan (A.2.8.1 - Care plan)is related toComposition.section:sectionPlanOfCare
HospitalDischargeReport.body.recommendations.medicationSummary (A.2.8.2 - Medication summary)is related toComposition.section:sectionDischargeMedications
HospitalDischargeReport.body.recommendations.otherRecommendations (A.2.8.3 - Other recommendations)is related toComposition.section:sectionDischargeInstructions.text
